scripts.setup: pip install Flask && pip install OpenAI && pip install python-docx && pip install opencv-python && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libgl1-mesa-glx && pip install Flask-Migrate && pip install pytesseract && pip install flask-jwt-extended
scripts.pytesseract-ocr: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y tesseract-ocr tesseract-ocr-spa
